name: TuyaSmartMQTTChannelKit
prefix_header_contents:
#ifdef __OBJC__
  #import <TuyaSmartBaseKit/TuyaSmartBaseKit.h>
  #undef TYLog
  #undef TYSDKLogDebug
  #undef TYSDKLogInfo
  #undef TYSDKLogWarn
  #undef TYSDKLogError
  #define TYSDKLogDebug(...)         TYSDKLog(0, @"TuyaSmartMQTTChannelKit", __FILE__, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, __LINE__, ##__VA_ARGS__)
  #define TYSDKLogInfo(...)         TYSDKLog(1, @"TuyaSmartMQTTChannelKit", __FILE__, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, __LINE__, ##__VA_ARGS__)
  #define TYSDKLogWarn(...)         TYSDKLog(2, @"TuyaSmartMQTTChannelKit", __FILE__, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, __LINE__, ##__VA_ARGS__)
  #define TYSDKLogError(...)         TYSDKLog(3, @"TuyaSmartMQTTChannelKit", __FILE__, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, __LINE__, ##__VA_ARGS__)

  #import "TuyaSmartMQTTChannelKit.h"

  #import "macros.h"

  #import "MQTTSession.h"
  #import "MQTTDecoder.h"
  #import "MQTTSessionLegacy.h"
  #import "MQTTSessionSynchron.h"
  #import "MQTTProperties.h"
  #import "MQTTMessage.h"
  #import "MQTTTransport.h"
  #import "MQTTCFSocketTransport.h"
  #import "MQTTCoreDataPersistence.h"
  #import "MQTTSSLSecurityPolicyTransport.h"
  #import "MQTTLog.h"

#endif
prepare_command:
curl -fSL https://github.com/novastone-media/MQTT-Client-Framework/archive/0.15.2.tar.gz -o MQTT-Client-Framework-0.15.2.tar.gz       && rm -rf MQTT-Client-Framework-0.15.2       && tar -zxvf MQTT-Client-Framework-0.15.2.tar.gz MQTT-Client-Framework-0.15.2/MQTTClient/MQTTClient/       && rm -rf MQTT-Client-Framework-0.15.2.tar.gz 
# pushd MQTT-Client-Framework-0.15.2/MQTTClient/MQTTClient/

# # Class name
# grep -Eh "@implementation\s+(\w+)$" *.{h,m}     #   | sed -E "s/@implementation (.*)/#define \1 TY\1/g"     #   > macros.h

# # Struct name
# grep -Eh "typedef NS_ENUM\(.*\)" *.{h,m}     #   | sed -E "s/.?typedef NS_ENUM\(.*, (.*)\) ?\{/#define \1 TY\1/g"     #   > struct_names.txt
# cat struct_names.txt >> macros.h
# cat struct_names.txt     #   | xargs -I {} grep -Eh '{}[a-zA-Z]+( = .*)?,' *.{h,m}     #   | sed -E 's/^ *(.*),.*$/\1/g'     #   >> macros.h

# popd
